name: does-match
description: A small lib for matching text searches by relevance

scripts.gh: git add -A; if [ $(git status -s | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then git commit -m "$MSG" && git push origin master && git checkout gh-pages && git rebase master && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master; else echo "Nothing to commit"; fi;

author: Rafael Eyng <rafaeleyng@gmail.com> (https://github.com/rafaeleyng)
